about.name: I'm Le Tang Co
about.titleIntro: I'm Le Tang Co - ReactJS Web Developer
about.titleContent: I am 21 years old and a student at University of Information Technology, Ho Chi Minh City, majoring in Information Systems. I joined 2 months as an intern at an Information Technology company with a passion for Web programming and wanted to learn, improve knowledge, and exchange with friends everywhere.

intro.content: years old and a student at University of Information Technology, Ho Chi Minh City, majoring in Information Systems. I joined 2 months as an intern at an Information Technology company with a passion for Website programming and wanted to learn, improve knowledge, and exchange with friends everywhere.

content.webDesign: Web design makes the website more attractive and eye-catching. Perform UI/UX optimization work
content.photography: Photography can only reproduce reality. But as soon as it is captured, that reality becomes part of the past
content.webDeveloper: Well-known developers all run into dilemmas until they solve it
content.videoEditing: I've never been a big fan of the music-video style of editing movies that crept in the last few decades
content.SEOOptimization: All top rankings have search engine optimization methods to get ranked higher
content.logoDesign: Logo is not only the representative image of an organization but also a message that its owner wants to send to the community
